mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply(replyno, contentsno, memberno, content, passwd, rdate) VALUES(reply_seq.nextval, #{contentsno}, #{memberno}, #{content}, #{passwd}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT replyno, contentsno, memberno, content, passwd, rdate FROM reply ORDER BY replyno DESC
SELECT replyno, contentsno, memberno, content, passwd, rdate FROM reply WHERE contentsno=#{contentsno} ORDER BY replyno DESC
SELECT m.id, r.replyno, r.contentsno, r.memberno, r.content, r.passwd, r.rdate FROM member m, reply r WHERE (m.memberno = r.memberno) AND r.contentsno=#{contentsno} ORDER BY r.replyno DESC
